about_the_game:
FIRESTORM: DEEP-DIVE is a first-person shooter survival game where you play as an elite member of Deep-Sea Diving Unit. Each player is equipped with K-78 Harpoon and the L-53 underwater Assault rifle to defend yourselves against the infinite number of sharks that lurk in the darkness with you. Choose from a variety of places to hold up and defend yourselves as a team of up to 4 or play by selves.


Features

  • Multiplayer online (IP JOINING ONLY)

  • 1 game mode of start game

  • O2 Tank PICK-UP, Ammo count PICK-UP, Armor PICK-UP, Health PICK-UP

  • HD Textures

(*) Options List (Adjustable Options - Texture Quality, Resolutions Quality, Shader Quality)

Planned Features
    (*) In-Game Market(*) Full Multiplayer Networking (Steam and Epic Game servers)(*) More Game Modes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: These components were used to build, test and play the game

Recommended:

  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gtx 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: FIRESTORM: DEEP-DIVE is a first-person shooter survival game where you play as an elite member of Deep-Sea Diving Unit. Each player is equipped with K-78 Harpoon and the L-53 underwater Assault rifle to defend yourselves against the sharks.
